item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: As the provider of the website https://app.ventory.io/, https://ventory.io (hereinafter “Website”) and a mobile application on the Apple and Google Play store, we at Ventory (“Ventory”) are Controller as defined in applicable data protection law, more specifically the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (“GDPR”), and are therefore responsible for the personal data (“Personal Data”) of the Website user.
